name: InitialBusCheat
title: Initial Bus Cheat Revived - Quick Start
author: Kontu
description: Update to DellAquila's cheat bus to make it work again (Permitted via Unlicense) https://mods.factorio.com/mod/InitialBusCheat -- An initial Bus that you can put on beginning of your factory that generates: 1 belt of coal, 1 belt of stone, 4 belts of iron ore, 4 belts of copper ore and a little energy until it explodes.You can set to get Iron Plates and Copper Plates instead of ores.
